mapper.select: SELECT a.code as productCode, a.print_job_id as printJobId, a.count, a.weight, a.amount, a.address, a.address_type as type, b.id as adImageId, b.image_path as adImagePath from rcs_foreseen_product as a left join rcs_ad_image as b on a.ad_image_id = b.id where a.print_job_id = #{printJobId}
